body.String: Components::Devices::Device::allInstances()->iterate(device;devicecount:Real=0| if device.id->size() = 1 and device.name->size() = 1 and device.uuid->size() = 1 and (device.observes->size() > 0 or device.hasReference->size() > 0 or device.hasComponent->size() > 0) then devicecount + 1 else devicecount + 0 endif ) = Components::Devices::Device::allInstances()->size()

opaqueexpression.text: Components::Devices::Device::allInstances()->iterate(device;devicecount:Real=0| if device.id->size() = 1 and device.name->size() = 1 and device.uuid->size() = 1 and (device.observes->size() > 0 or device.hasReference->size() > 0 or device.hasComponent->size() > 0) then devicecount + 1 else devicecount + 0 endif ) = Components::Devices::Device::allInstances()->size()
